com.namics.oss.java.tools.utils.excel

Class ExcelUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.namics.oss.java.tools.utils.excel.ExcelUtils

  • public abstract class ExcelUtils
extends Object
    Utils to supprot reading and writing from / to excel files. If you need more controll over the process, use ExcelBeanReader or ExcelBeanWriter directly
    Since:
    21.07.15 09:28
    Author:
    aschaefer, Namics AG

    • Method Detail

      • readBeans

        public static <T> List<T> readBeans(Class<T> clazz,
                                    InputStream input)
        Read the excel file and map rows to beans of type T
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type od beans returned (determined by clazz)
        Parameters:
        clazz - class of the Beans to return (T)
        input - input stream of the excel to read
        Returns:
        List of beans read form excel
        Throws:
        ExcelException - runtime exception when excel processiing failed

      • read

        @Deprecated
public static <T> List<T> read(Class<T> clazz,

      • readBeans

        public static <T> List<T> readBeans(Class<T> clazz,
                                    InputStream input,
                                    Map<String,String> mapping)
        Read the excel file and map rows to beans of type T
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type od beans returned (determined by clazz)
        Parameters:
        clazz - class of the Beans to return (T)
        input - input stream of the excel to read
        mapping - map for mapping. key=header value, value=name of property descriptor
        Returns:
        List of beans read form excel
        Throws:
        ExcelException - runtime exception when excel processiing failed

      • read

        @Deprecated
public static <T> List<T> read(Class<T> clazz,
                                           InputStream input,
                                           Map<String,String> mapping)
        Deprecated. replaced by readBeans(Class, InputStream, Map)

      • writeBeans

        public static void writeBeans(List<?> beans,
                              OutputStream outputStream,
                              String... ignores)
        Write a list of bean to excel file, support for xlsx only.
        Parameters:
        beans - beans to write to an excel sheet
        outputStream - output stream to write the excel sheet
        ignores - list of properties to be ignored on writing
        Throws:
        ExcelException - runtime exception when excel processiing failed

      • write

                              OutputStream outputStream,

        Parameters:
        beans - beans to write to an excel sheet
        outputStream - output stream to write the excel sheet
        mapping - map for mapping. key=name of property descriptor, value=header value
        Throws:
        ExcelException - runtime exception when excel processiing failed
